attributes.action: BRING BACK CORPORAL PUNISHMENT TO OUR SCHOOLS
attributes.additional_details:
In light of recent looting/thuggery in August 2011,it is now time 'The Great British' public stood up for a vote in Parliament,on bringing back Corporal Punishment to Schools.
For to long now, since abolishing punishment in schools, discipline in youths has made a mockery of our once Good Mannered & well disciplined Society.
Disciplinary Powers should be given back to our once Respected Teaching Staff NOW!!
